ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.navigation.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Main navigation class of the system. Contains all the basic travel methods necessary.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Team 2
